strats.name: Green Brinstar Main Shaft Ice Clip
Green Brinstar Main Shaft X-Ray Climn
Base
strats.note: This has no requirements, but getting back out does!

strats.name: Mockball
strats.note: Not considered a notable strat because executing this has no real value.

strats.name: Early Supers Quick Crumble Escape
strats.note: This requires coming to this node from node 1, but it's not explicitly stated since that's the only meaningful way in.

to.note: A speedball strat can be doable here, depending on adjacent runway, but between the grey door and the number of runway tiles in this room that can't be used for that, it might be better to omit it.

rooms.name: Noob Bridge aka A Bridge Too Far

nodes.name: Spore Spawn
nodes.note: Spore Spawn's pollen does not drop Supers. Relying on them could lead to a softlock.
